description: System-generated unique identifier for this asset meter record.
Flag indicating whether this is the asset’s primary meter used for utilization/maintenance calculations (1=yes, 0=no).
Identifier of the asset to which this meter applies; foreign key to the asset master.
Reference to the meter type (e.g., odometer, engine hours); links to a meter type/lookup table.
Most recent recorded meter value for the asset at the time of last update.
Control flag to automatically calculate average daily usage for this meter (1=yes, 0=no).
Calculated average change per day for this meter; used for forecasting and data validation.
Configured value at which the meter resets to zero (odometer rollover); likely 0 when not applicable—confirm with SME.
Unit of measure for the meter reading (e.g., miles, kilometers, hours).
Free-text notes regarding this meter or its configuration.
System timestamp of the most recent change to this record.
Number of times this meter has rolled over; used to derive true cumulative usage.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record; appears redundant with last_modified—confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this record; references the user directory.
Timestamp when the record was initially created by a user.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Timestamp of the last user-initiated modification to this record.
